name: Twitter Connector
shortDescription: A Hazelcast Jet connector for consuming data from Twitter stream sources in Jet pipelines.
longDescription: A Hazelcast Jet connector for Twitter Streaming API which enables Hazelcast Jet pipelines to consume tweets from multiple Twitter APIs:  - Twitter’s Streaming API – Push from Twitter, real-time stream, it samples tweets (1-40% of Tweets can be consumed this way) - Twitter’s Search API – result limited to 15 tweets per request, and 180 requests every 15 minutes.
